caption.title: Saliva and nasal mAb abundance correlates with serum at late timepoints.
caption.p: (A) Averaged fractional mucosal mAb levels for nasal mucosa (red), rectal mucosa (green) and saliva (blue) with shaded 95% confidence interval. (B) Relative nasal (left) and buccal (right) mucosal mAb levels at weeks 2, 4 and 5â€“24 (top, middle, and bottom, respectively).
